title: Cruise from North to OCD XIV

posts.content:
Planning to start the route at Donington Service on the M1/A42 on Thursday 22nd May.
Be ready to set off from here at 08:20 (Full of fuel)
Suggest first stop is the McDonalds on M5 (J12/A38)
We should arrive here about 10:30 and suggest a 30 minute stop.(I'm having a McDonalds breakfast, I'm on holiday!)
Next stop Gordano on M5 arriving about 11:40. Early lunch?
Stop here for 30 mins and refuel for anyone who needs to top up.
Set off from here about 12:15 to arrive at M5(J27) about 13:30.

Summary
======
Set Off Donington 08:20
Arrive M5 J12/A38) McDonalds @ 10:30
Leave at 11:00
Arrive at Gordano Services @ 11:40
Leave at 12:15
Arrive at M5 J27 around 13:30

All based on max speed of 50mph.

Will Leigh make it to this starting point for the first time in 2 years.

If you're planning on convoying down with us, please add you name and meeting point, just so we have an idea. Or if you want to meet at another point, let me know an we can adjust route.

Thanks

Otherwise, see you all at M5 J27

So to start list.

1) Donington (CCSICeman) aka Andrew and Michelle

1) Donington (CCSICeman) aka Andrew and Michelle
2) Donington (Split Bus) Kev and Erin

1) Donington (CCSICeman) aka Andrew and Michelle
2) Donington (Split Bus) Kev and Erin
3) Donington (Panel Van Lee) Lee,Hayley,Carla and Freddie

Third time lucky Andrew ! Hopefully no last minute engine changes or problems
Off to the garage !

1) Donington (CCSICeman) aka Andrew and Michelle
2) Donington (Split Bus) Kev and Erin
3) Donington (Panel Van Lee) Lee,Hayley,Carla and Freddie
4) Donington (Ebeneezer) Paul and Linda
